duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide direct and individualized nursing care to patients based on the application of scientific nursing principles.
Assess, plan, deliver, and evaluate nursing care to meet patient needs.
Report and document all observed symptoms, reactions, treatments, and changes in the patient's condition.
Collaborate with interdisciplinary medical team to create and adjust patient care plans.
Educate patients and their families on proper treatment, care, and medication usage.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor of Science in Nursing (BSN) degree
